name: LD37 - Ballroom
description:
You accidentally hit a witch with your ball. Now, she cursed you - you are now trapped in a room with some balls, and she said she will release you if you throw them all in the trash. Seems easy, but there is a catch...

Controls: WASD + Mouse for movement, left click to pick/throw balls, right click to drag furniture, Esc to exit.

-bugfix version is a bugfix made after the Ludum Dare deadline, preventing balls from passing through the floor sometimes (which would make the game unwinnable)
